import React from 'react' import Logo from '../img/MEME.gif' import axios from 'axios' function Profile({ userInfo, setCurrentPage, bearer, setUserInfo, setBearer }) { const [modalURL, setModalURL] = ("") function refreshMemes(event) { axios({ url: "http://localhost:8000/api/user", method: "get", headers: { Accept: "application/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${bearer}` } }) .then(response => setUserInfo(previnfo => previnfo = response.data)) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) } function deleteMeme(event) { axios({ url: `http://localhost:8000/delete/${event}`, method: "delete", }) .then((e) => refreshMemes(e)) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) } function logOut() { axios({ url: "http://localhost:8000/logout", method: "get", headers: { Accept: "application/json", Authorization: `Bearer ${bearer}` } }) .then(console.log("YEEET"), setCurrentPage('login'), setBearer(''), setUserInfo('')) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) } return (
